mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element ReferralRequest

Documentation:

Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • ClinicalStatement

              • ReferralRequest
Used By:
